sentence.text: As a result, 14 SNPs had a significant odds ratio (OR) for lung cancer risk with P FDR AAAA 0.05, of which rs3115672 in mismatch repair (OR = 1.20, 95% CI = 1.14-1.27) and rs114596632 in transcription by RNA polymerase II (OR = 1.19, 95% CI = 1.12-1.25) at 6q21.33 were the most statistically significant (P combined = 3.99×10(-11) and P combined = 5.40×10(-10), respectively).
